name: City Core Parkour
description:
Houdini Game Jam 2022 Entry


-----------------------City Core Parkour------------------------
This is a 3D platformer created in Unity.

The objective is to make it to the end of each level. I put green floating arrows to direct you in the first level, the second level is purposefully a bit of a maze

The Second Level includes traps and ghosts that can damage the player.

Update version 1.0 includes a checkpoint system.

Houdini was used to chop up the KITBASH3D Neo City assets provided for the competition and turned them into a handfull of HDAs for building up the levels.

--------------------------Controls---------------------------
Keyboard & Mouse
ESC - Brings up Menu to Restart or Quit
WASD - Movement
SPACE - Jump Key ( It is a little finicky and unfortunately it is safest to come to a complete stop to ensure the jump button actually registers)
Enter - Accept Key
MOUSE - Controls the camera

Gamepad
Select - Bring up menu to Restart or Quit
Left Stick - Movement
A (south button) - Jump button & Accept button
B (east button) - Cancel button
